blog.name: rhaigals
blog.title: everything else just melts away
blog.description: "all the elements in your body were forged many, many millions of years ago in the heart of a far away star that explosed and died. that explosion scattered those elements across the desolations of deep space, until, eventually, they came together to make you. you are unique in the universe." - doctor who. marie; taurus, istj. blarke is my core, olicity trash, bitter queen. love girls on tv, pro-girls unity. atla/tlok hoe. waiting for the doctor. samwise gamgee saved middle earth. daensa is endgame, & sansa and dany are both queens ; protect the dragons (and the direwolves). sam winchester and jack kline are the softest. korra is bae. thor is the strongest avenger. mcu/dc(tv), lotr, got, spn. [ship and let ship]

summary: GoT season 7
body:
GoT season 7

Okay este … Jon y Dany… why???? Yo estaba emocionada por ellos y boom sale ser que ella es la tía?? Wtf?? 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️ So Jon es el rightful heir. Cool aunque quería que fuese Dany. Ya terminé GoT wiii! Hasta el 14 de abril.

summary: The One That Got Away
title: The One That Got Away
body:
Nine years

CIARA’S P.O.V"No you can’t go"“I have to”“No you don’t! Stay with me don’t go back”“I have to!”“But your my best friend you can’t leave me!”“My dad said I have to”“CIARA HONEY COME ON ITS TIME TO GO!”…

Read more…

summary: What’s wrong with “sansa wasn’t smiling when jon was crowned”? I mean her efforts were completely ignored because she’s a women....
question: What’s wrong with “sansa wasn’t smiling when jon was crowned”? I mean her efforts were completely ignored because she’s a women. Like they said that Jon is Ned’s son, but Sansa is Ned’s trueborn daughter, she should have the throne. I dunno but if I was Sansa I would of been annoyed as heck
answer:
Basically Jon stans think she should have been thrilled for Jon because unlike him she didn’t physically fight in the battle and therefore all her contributions don’t matter. Let’s see what Sansa did:

  • decide to go war because she knew Ramsay would never let her go
  • go to every house they could visit to try and convince them to join the fight
  • realised that they don’t have enough men to fight with. She had seen Stannis get beaten with similar numbers
  • write to Littlefinger to ask him to bring the Knights of Vale
  • try to advise Jon about Ramsay though he wouldn’t listen. She told him Ramsay would play mind games with Jon which he did
  • the Knights of the Vale came in time to win the battle and they came for Sansa
  • executed Ramsay

Now Jon did bring the wildlings but he didn’t follow any of the battle plans he came up with including digging trenches or staying in formation, he didn’t want to go to more Houses for help in case there was a storm and he didn’t give his army a single command while they were being slaughtered. The reason the lords crowned him was apparently that he won the battle but he didn’t, he was so bad at commanding that the Bolton army slowly encircled his men and trapped them there. The Northern lords overlooked Sansa despite her contributions and her status as a trueborn daughter. Then when Sansa acted as an advisor to Jon, he became angry about it even though she wasn’t the only one who disagreed with him. His anger is perplexing because it wasn’t as if he gave her a heads up or discussed it with her beforehand. Jon stans don’t want Jon questioned, they put so much stock on his ability to fight that they use it to claim Sansa is useless in comparison. Jon was barely king before he left, Sansa ran the kingdom competently but because she doesn’t wield a weapon, the fandom tries to claim she wasn’t good at it, all to try and make Jon look better.
